title: Nvidia Gives Strong Forecast, Countering Bubble Fears
description: Nvidia Corp., the worldâ€™s most valuable company, gave a strong revenue forecast for the current period, helping counter concern that a global surge in AI spending is poised to fizzle.

title: Meta AI Pioneer LeCun Announces Exit, Plans New Startup
description: Yann LeCun, an artificial intelligence pioneer who runs a research lab at Meta Platforms Inc., told employees that he will depart the social media giant at the end of the year and start a new company, according to a memo obtained by Bloomberg News.

title: Abbott Nears Deal for Cancer Test Maker Exact Sciences
description: Abbott Laboratories is nearing a potential acquisition of cancer screening company Exact Sciences Corp., people familiar with the matter said, in what could be the biggest deal of the year in the global health-care sector.
